Reviews.Title: “La dolce vita”
Reviews.Author: Helen M
Reviews.Content: eperience hotel excellent personal realy tourism receptionists willing help directions printing maps cleaning service experience cleanest rome breakfast fresh consistent vegetables missing congrats guys

Reviews.Title: “Not in City Centre”
Reviews.Author: GeorginaP161
Reviews.Content: booked hotel package easyjet told 15 mins walk city centre correct actually 15 mins walk metro station walk centre rome hotel nice clean freezing cold bedroom heating coffeetea facilities buffet breakfast selection feb 2012 snow couldnt hot bath water tepid recommend hotel friends family cost 50 euros airport hotel taxi

Reviews.Title: “very average”
Reviews.Author: loveducks
Reviews.Content: hotel situated 2030mins city centre metro italian hotels tiny facilities lifts tiny bathroom bidet shower bedroom 2 luggage wardrobes hangers coffeetea facilities english channels available tv programs walking distance metro 20mins choice accommodation return rome definitely decent clean stay

Reviews.Title: “Not a 4* but still nice”
Reviews.Author: UKTraveller1991
Reviews.Content: girlfriend stayed 3 nights january 2012 bit nervous especially reading reviews hotel surrounding pleasantly surprised experienced hotel 510 minute walk metro station isnt rough dangerous attractive middle rome mainly residential neither danger uneasy walking 8pm darkness aircon balcony nice clean bathroom double bed actually single mattresses pushed sheet top caused comfortable slept noted breakfast little sparse options food available nice arent impressed theres carrefour market 2 minutes nice summer windows etc receptionist helpful allowing store bags free day whilst bit souvenir seeing theres single computer quickly checking emails etc free wifi available hotspot €6 3 hours remember correctly wouldnt called star 4 hotel probably 3 pleasant nonetheless id stay rome

Reviews.Title: “An average hotel for those on a budget”
Reviews.Author: samuel295
Reviews.Content: chose hotel bargain offering competitively priced winter breaks excellent size bathroom cleanest bed linen clean duvets pillows appeared night stayed hotel 18 olds tour played football noisily hours morning breakfast ok fresh fruit fresh fruit juice main drawback hotel city 10 minutes tube station line busstop 50 yards adventurous change buses centre service hotel ok helped book taxi airport advised public transport strike time ring hob wardrobes etc unusable hotel amount free secure parking garden patch grass bench

HotelInfo.Name: Roma Park
HotelInfo.Address: Via della Caffarelletta 114, 00179 Rome, Italy
